name: sitevision-resource-handler

scripts.watch: npm run clean && concurrently "parcel watch src/ts/index.ts --dist-dir dist/js" "node watch.js"
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/ts/index.ts --dist-dir dist/js && node build.js

author: Mattias <mattias@amazeit.dev>
description: Will handle compilation and auto upload of resource files to Sitevision webdav.
